main event: An observation of a round object with a triangular portion rotating was reported on November 14, 1957 in St. Charles, Missouri.
interesting points: The object had a white round portion and a red triangular part that was revolving like a spinning semaphore., The observation lasted for 1 hour., The object was moving up and down sideways., The sighting was concluded to be possibly Venus., The observation was made by a civilian.
sighted object: round object with a triangular portion
